snippet: As the Mets and Blue Jays continue to discuss a trade for R.A. Dickey, the only certainty appears to be that New York would get Travis d’Arnaud, widely regarded as a top-20 overall prospect.
abstract: New York Mets are close to trading pitcher R A Dickey to Toronto Blue Jays in package built around elite catching prospect Travis d'Arnaud.
lead_paragraph: As the Mets and Blue Jays continue to discuss a trade for R.A. Dickey, the only certainty appears to be that New York would get Travis d’Arnaud, widely regarded as a top-20 overall prospect.

headline.seo: Jays’ D’Arnaud, Sought by Mets, Is Top Catching Prospect
headline.main: Catcher Who Can Hit Rules Mets’ Trade Talk
headline.print_headline: Catcher Who Can Hit Rules Mets’ Trade Talk
